member.name: T:KalikoCMS.IDashboardArea
member.summary: Inherit this interface in order to add your own dashboards into the administration interface.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.IDashboardArea.Icon
member.summary: The icon that should be used in the left menu.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.IDashboardArea.MenuName
member.summary: The text displayed in the left menu.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.IDashboardArea.Path
member.summary: The path from where the dashboard will be loaded. If no leading slash is entered, the path is relative to the admin path.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.IDashboardArea.Title
member.summary: The title displayed for the dashboard.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Dashboard
member.summary: Handles the dashboards in the administration interface. A dashboard corresponds with a section in the left menu within the admin ui.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PageFactory
member.summary: PageFactory is the class to use in order to interact with the pages in the system. Whether it's fetching one or multiple pages or deleting one you'll find functions for it here.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Utils
member.summary: Class that collects various helpful functions.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.Dashboard.RegisterArea(KalikoCMS.IDashboardArea)
member.summary: Used to register a custom dashboard area in the administration interface.

member.name: F:KalikoCMS.Dashboard.Areas
member.summary: Contains all registered dashboard areas. This field should not be written to directly. All registration should go through RegisterArea.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.DeletePage(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete a single page from the system.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.FindPage(System.String,KalikoCMS.ContentProvider.IRequestManager)
member.summary: Try to route the requested Url. Returns true if handled or false if not.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetAncestors
member.summary: Get a collection with all ancestors to a page. Usefull for bread crumbs and to traverse through parents. Related to GetPagePath but without the current page in the list.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetChildrenForPage
member.summary: Gets children for a page based on publish state or predicate.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetChildrenForPageOfPageType
member.summary: Gets children of a specified page type for a particular page.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPage
member.summary: Gets a page based on the identity parameters passed to the function.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPageIdFromUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the id for a page based on the specified url.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPagePath
member.summary: Gets a collection of a page and all it's ancestors. Usefull for bread crumbs and to traverse through parents. Related to GetAncestors but also includes the current pag.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPages
member.summary: Get all pages based on a certain criteria. Performs a site wide search.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPageTreeFromPage
member.summary: Get a collection with the page tree from a specified root.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetParentAtLevel(System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the specified page's parent from the defined level. For instance if you call this function with a page that is 5 levels beyond the root and request the second level page the system will itterate through the parents until it's on level 2 and return that page.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetSpecificVersion
member.summary: Get a specific version of a page.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetWorkingCopy(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets or creates a new working copy version of a page.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.MovePage(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move the specified page to the new parent specified as target.
member.param: Target page identifier to which the page should be moved.
Position in the target node. Used to recalculate sort order.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.ReorderChildren(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reorder children when the parent page is set to sort its children using SortIndex.
member.param: Page identifier that should be reordered.
Parent page identifier of the page.
Position in the target node. Used to recalculate sort order.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetAncestors(KalikoCMS.Core.CmsPage)
member.summary: Get a collection with all ancestors to a page. Usefull for bread crumbs and to traverse through parents. Related to GetPagePath but without the current page in the list.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetAncestors(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a collection with all ancestors to a page. Usefull for bread crumbs and to traverse through parents. Related to GetPagePath but without the current page in the list.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetChildrenForPage(System.Guid,KalikoCMS.Core.PublishState)
member.summary: Gets all children under a particular page that matches the publish state given. By default publish state is PublishState.Published.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetChildrenForPage(System.Guid,System.Predicate{KalikoCMS.Core.PageIndexItem})
member.summary: Gets all children under a particular page that matches the predicate. This can be used to only list pages that should be visible in a menu, or that matches any other criteria.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetChildrenForPageOfPageType(System.Guid,System.Int32,KalikoCMS.Core.PublishState)
member.summary: Gets children of a specified page type for a particular page.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetChildrenForPageOfPageType(System.Guid,System.Type,KalikoCMS.Core.PublishState)
member.summary: Gets children of a specified page type for a particular page.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPage(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a specified page based on identity and language. This will return a CmsPage object so you will not find it's properties strongly typed. Instead you can access them using the objects Property collection (myPage.Property["MyPropertyName"])
member.returns: Returns a generic page object.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPage(System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a specified page. This will return a CmsPage object so you will not find it's properties strongly typed. Instead you can access them using the objects Property collection (myPage.Property["MyPropertyName"])
member.returns: Returns a generic page object.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPage``1(System.Guid)

summary.para: Get a typed version of a specified page. This is usefull if you know what type of page you are getting. If you don't you should go with the more generic GetPage(Guid pageId).

member.returns: Returns a strongly typed page.

summary.para: Get a typed version of a specified page and language. This is usefull if you know what type of page you are getting. If you don't you should go with the more generic GetPage(Guid pageId, int languageId).

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.PageFactory.GetPagePath(KalikoCMS.Core.CmsPage)
member.summary: Gets a collection of the specified page and all it's ancestors. Usefull for bread crumbs and to traverse through parents.

member.summary: Gets a collection of the specified page by it's identity and all it's ancestors. Usefull for bread crumbs and to traverse through parents.

member.summary: Get all pages based on a specified predicate.

member.param: Predicate used to filter through all pages of the site.

member.summary: Get all pages of a specific page type and publish state.

member.summary: Get all pages of a specific page type and publish state.

member.summary: Get a collection with the page tree from a specified root where the pages match the specified predicate.

member.summary: Get a collection with the page tree from a specified root down to a specified lead. Useful for following a specific branch of the tree in - for instance - a menu tree between the root and the active page.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute
member.summary: Used to decorate classes that inherit from CmsPage in order to declare pagetypes. This attribute is required in order for the system to find which pagetypes that is available.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyAttribute
member.summary: Used to decorate properties in pagetypes. This attribute is required in order for the system to recognize a property as being a page property.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyTypeAttribute
member.summary: Used to decorate custom property types. This attribute is required in order for the system to find and add the property type to the system.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use this constructor when building a website with ASP.NET Mvc.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use this constructor when building a website with ASP.NET WebForms.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.AllowedTypes
member.summary: Optional property that limits which page types can be created under a page of this type. If not specified all page types are available.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.DefaultChildSortDirection
member.summary: Optional property that determines the default sort order of the children to a page of this type. If not specified ascending order is used.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.DefaultChildSortOrder
member.summary: Optional property that determines the default sort mode of the children to a page of this type. If not specified SortIndex is used

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.DisplayName
member.summary: This is the name that will be displayed for the page type in the user interface.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.Name
member.summary: This is the internal name that acts as a key for the page type. This value should not be changed once set!

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.PageTemplate
member.summary: The path to the template file for the page. Only used with WebForms, leave blank if using Mvc.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.PageTypeDescription
member.summary: An optional description that is shown in the administrative user interface when creating a new page.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PageTypeAttribute.PreviewImage
member.summary: Optional property for setting the path to a preview image for the page type. This preview is shown when creating a new page.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyAttribute.Header
member.summary: Header displayed for the property in the page editor.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyAttribute.Parameters
member.summary: Parameter passed to the editor. In the base class this is always null, override in order to pass parameters to the editor for custom property types.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyTypeAttribute.Description
member.summary: Description of the property type.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyTypeAttribute.EditorControl
member.summary: Path to user control that is used to edit the property type.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyTypeAttribute.Name
member.summary: Name of the property type.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Attributes.PropertyTypeAttribute.PropertyTypeId
member.summary: Unique identifier.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.ContentProvider.IPageExtender.HandleRequest(System.Guid,System.String[])
member.summary: Called when a request is made to a sub url that isn't a page in the system. Will pass the identifier of the page that will act as the page extender as well as all url segments that are below that page.
member.param: Unique identifier of the page that acts as a page extender.
An array with the url segments that are below the page acting as page extender.

member.summary: Implement this interface in order to have custom code run at system start up.

member.name: M:KalikoCMS.Core.IStartupSequence.Startup
member.summary: The method that will be called by the system at startup.

member.name: P:KalikoCMS.Core.IStartupSequence.StartupOrder
member.summary: Number that will determine which order all IStartupSequence implementations within the application will run. A number lower than 0 will run before the main system initialization (database setup etc.) where a higher number than 0 will run after.

member.summary: This is the default data store provider and it will store the data in the same database as the rest of the content is.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Modules.InitModule
member.summary: Essential module that handles all initialization of the system from ensuring that the database is up-to-date to building an in memory index of all pages.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Modules.RequestModuleBase
member.summary: Abstract class that acts as foundation for request modules such as the included KalikoCMS.WebForms.RequestModule and KalikoCMS.Mvc.RequestModule.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.Modules.ShortUrlModule
member.summary: Provides additional short hand Urls to pages in the system.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.IPageSavedHandler
member.summary: Interface that if implemented by a property editor signals to the system that it should call a special method after the page is saved. This will ensure that logic that needs to run after a successfully validated save is called.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.LinkProperty.LinkType
member.summary: Defines whether a link is local to a page, local to a file or external.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.BooleanProperty
member.summary: Is used to represent true or false.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.CollectionProperty`1
member.summary: Is used to create dynamic collections of another property type.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.DateTimeProperty
member.summary: Is used for dates.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.FileProperty
member.summary: Is used to link to local files.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.HtmlProperty
member.summary: Is used for HTML content.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.ImageProperty
member.summary: Is used for images, allows the developer to set up image restrictions such as width and/or height (by using the ImagePropertyAttribute).

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.ImagePropertyAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to use for ImageProperty properties in order to specify width and/or height.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.LinkProperty
member.summary: Is used to point to either an external URL, a local page or file.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.NumericProperty
member.summary: Is used for integers.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.PageLinkProperty
member.summary: Is used to point towards any page in the system.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.PropertyEditorBase
member.summary: The base class that all property editors should inherit from.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.StringProperty
member.summary: Is used for simple strings represented by a single line in the editor.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.TagProperty
member.summary: Is used to add tags to a page.

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.TagPropertyAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to use for TagProperty properties in order to specify which tag context to use for that particular property. (Allows the use of different tagging spaces for the same page).

member.name: T:KalikoCMS.PropertyType.TextProperty
member.summary: Is used for longer strings represented by a multi line text area in the editor.
